## Intermediate2Options interface

gulp-intermediate2 plugin options

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface Intermediate2Options 
```

## Properties

[container?](./gulp-intermediate2.intermediate2options.container.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Process input temp directory relative path. The directory that files are written to, relative to the operating system's temporary directory. The container is emptied before every run.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[destOptions?](./gulp-intermediate2.intermediate2options.destoptions.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

vfs.DestOptions


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Options for `gulp.dest` for writing files to [container](./gulp-intermediate2.intermediate2options.container.md) temp directory before processing.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[output?](./gulp-intermediate2.intermediate2options.output.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Process output dir relative path. The directory read back into the stream when processing is finished. Relative to tempDir.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[srcGlobs?](./gulp-intermediate2.intermediate2options.srcglobs.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string \| string\[\]


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Process output files glob. Glob for `gulp.src` for reading files from [output](./gulp-intermediate2.intermediate2options.output.md) temp directory after processing.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[srcOptions?](./gulp-intermediate2.intermediate2options.srcoptions.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

vfs.SrcOptions


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ `gulp.src` options for process output files. Options for `gulp.src` for reading files from [output](./gulp-intermediate2.intermediate2options.output.md) temp directory after processing.


</td></tr>
